## Research Projects

**Geospatial and Sociodemographic Inequities in Non-Communicable Diseases**<br>
*B.S. Project | 2025*<br>
**Topic:** Insights from the BDHS 2021-22 regarding health inequities among ever-married women in Bangladesh.<br>
*Supervised by:* Mr. Priom Saha (ISRT, University of Dhaka).<br>
*Tools:* R (Tidyverse, sf), Geospatial Mapping, Statistical Modeling.

**Students' Opinion on Party-based Student Politics**<br>
*Survey Project (DURS) | 2024*<br>
**Scope:** Analyzed student perspectives on political activities at the University of Dhaka.<br>
*Status:* [Published on the Dhaka University Website](https://du.ac.bd/du_post_details/news/21754).<br>
*Role:* Lead Researcher for survey design and data analysis.


## Working Papers

*Transformation of Coastal Livelihood*<br>
An investigation into the shifting economic and environmental landscape of coastal regions in Bangladesh.<br>
**Focus:** Sustainability and adaptive strategies in the face of climate change.



## Research Interests

* Public Health Analytics: Investigating non-communicable diseases and health inequities using large-scale survey data (e.g., BDHS).
* Spatial Statistics: Applying geospatial modeling and machine learning to understand environmental and regional disparities.
* Modern Modeling: Exploring Bayesian inference, causal inference, and big data analytics.
